Name: grocerygod
Summary: No idea what to eat? No problem. grocerygod is a meal generating app to help people plan healthy meals for up to a week. Sound useful? Have an Android? Check it out:

Name: World Wide Reed
Summary: This is my playground for learning web stuff. Those poor, poor <div>'s. Right now it's hacked together with some Bootstrap 3 and Handlebars, running on a go server hosted by Heroku. There's your serving of buzzwords for the day.
